## Bayesian Statistic: On Time Bus Arrivals 

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(bayesrules)
library(here)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
bus_ontime <- read_csv(here('data/hawaii_bus_ontime.csv'))
```
### Subset Data: Route 1

```{r, warning=FALSE}
route1 <- bus_ontime[bus_ontime$Route == "Route 1", ]
```

### Plot Prior

```{r, warning=FALSE}
plot_gamma(shape = 40, rate = 2, mode = TRUE, mean = TRUE)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
sum(route1$OnTime_Arrivals)
```

### Plot Posterior

```{r, warning=FALSE}
plot_gamma_poisson(shape = 40, rate = 2, sum_y = 424, n = 10)
```
